forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely before 10am, then a slight chance of snow showers between 10am and 11am. Cloudy, with a high near 34. North wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 17. West wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
The morning in Boston unfolds under a veil of heavy gray, hinting at a lingering chill as snow flurries dance through the air. The forecast suggests a soft hush of snow likely before 10 a.m., an invitation to embrace the winter’s gentle whims, albeit with an uncertain touch as light showers may linger momentarily after. The clouds cling tightly, casting a muted light over the city, a backdrop painted in shades of slate and frost. As the day progresses, the promise of much colder air creeps in, nudging the temperature near the mid-thirties, while a subtle north wind whispers through, creating a crisp ambiance that commands attention.

As twilight approaches tonight, the sky will start to clear, revealing the stark beauty of a starry winter’s night. With temperatures dropping to the teens, layers will be your ally; a warm coat, complemented by a scarf and sturdy boots will provide comfort amidst the biting air. Such a day is perfect for a leisurely stroll through Boston’s historic streets, perhaps meandering past old brick buildings and sampling a hot beverage from a local café, allowing yourself to sink into the warm embrace of a cozy atmosphere—enough to dispel the chill without hastening away the day. Embrace clarity in thought, as this winter morning cradles you in its tranquil yet invigorating grasp.
